name: Tower locked
description:
Welcome in Tower locked game!

This is great puzzle game with pixel art graphics. This adventure is for you! Use all of your brain power to solve the puzzles! 'Tower locked" test your skills and work out your brain in this fun, addictive puzzle game.

How to play this game:
All 'numbers in red circles' in horizontal or vertical line must create the sum of the numbers in the square. If sum is more then Square number click on red circle number to disable from the sum! That's all!

Features:
Automatic save
Pixel Art background pictures
Easy to play
Hard to master
addictive and fun

Tower locked available now!
Thank you for playing this game!
